Class TexturedAppearance

java.lang.Object
  javax.media.j3d.SceneGraphObject

          javax.media.j3d.Appearance
              explore3d.appearances.TexturedAppearance

public class TexturedAppearance
extends javax.media.j3d.Appearance

Textured appearance for flat objects (panels,floor, ceiling etc)

Author:
J.J. Molenaar, J.Dooper

Constructor Detail

TexturedAppearance

private TexturedAppearance(int plane,
                           java.lang.String filename,
                           int width,
                           int height)
Create a textured appearance for a particular plane, with a texture from a particular filename, with a certain width and a certain height

Parameters:
plane - One of FRONT_PLANE, SIDE_PLANE or FLAT_PLANE
filename - Filename of texture
width - Width of texture
height - Height of texture
